posts.post_content:
Hello all, trying to pull a rabbit out of a hat here!

I figure it's safe to call these auctions out now that I have the tracking info on mine and they are currently tracked to delivery tomorrow. 

If you won this Detroit figure and want to make a tad of a profit send me an IM with what you were looking for if this was not the most important item to you. Regretting my snipe setting now - 

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/Nice-Victorian-Scrap-Die-Cut-Baseball-Player-Detroits-Detroit-No-Reserve-/181899271924[/url]

I won the St.Louis, Boston and Pittsburg players if you would like to instead do a possible trade if this was a type-card buy.


Card found and added to my Tigers type collection - Thanks Brad!
